v-model.description: The selected item binds a value

:options.description: Selectable data source, key name configurable via the 'Props' property
:options.description_zh: 可选项数据源，键名可通过 `Props` 属性配置

:props.description: The following table describes the configuration options

clearable.description: Whether the purge option is supported

show-all-levels.description: Whether or not to display the full path of the selected value in the input box
show-all-levels.description_zh: 输入框中是否显示选中值的完整路径

collapse-tags.description: Whether to fold the tag in multi-select mode

:filter-method.description: Customize the search logic, the first parameter is the node 'node', the second parameter is the search keyword 'keyword', and the boolean value is returned to indicate whether it is hit
:filter-method.description_zh: 自定义搜索逻辑，第一个参数是节点`node`，第二个参数是搜索关键词`keyword`，通过返回布尔值表示是否命中

:debounce.description: The debounce delay of the search keyword input, in milliseconds
:debounce.description_zh: 搜索关键词输入的去抖延迟，毫秒

:before-filter.description: The hook before filtering, the parameter is the input value, if it returns false or returns a Promise and is rejected, the filter will be stopped
:before-filter.description_zh: 筛选之前的钩子，参数为输入的值，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止筛选

popper-class.description: Customize the name of the floating layer class

methods.name: getCheckedNodes
methods.description: Gets the selected array of nodes

methods.name: togglePopperVisible
methods.description_zh: 切换 popper 可见状态

methods.name: contentRef
methods.description: The ref of the Cascader content

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when a node is selected
events.description_zh: 当选中节点变化时触发

events.name: expand-change
events.description: Triggered when the expansion node changes
events.params: 各父级选项值组成的数组
events.description_zh: 当展开节点发生变化时触发

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box appears/hides
events.params: 出现则为 true，隐藏则为 false
events.description_zh: 下拉框出现/隐藏时触发

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: In multi-select mode, it is triggered when the tag is removed
events.params: 移除的Tag对应的节点的值
events.description_zh: 在多选模式下，移除Tag时触发

slots.name: empty
slots.description: What to do when there are no matching options
